thread.section_title: Hotel de l'Empereur - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beyond Expectation!
thread.title_full: Beyond Expectation! - Review of Hotel de l'Empereur, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: macca05
title: Beyond Expectation!
text:
This hotel is rated *** but I believe it to ****
The staff were easy to contact via email and gave us directions on how to get to hotel via metro. Location was excellent for a late night stroll to Eiffel Tower and Bistro. Our room was renovated and super clean. The bed and linen was 10/10. The bathroom and towels clean, fluffy white towels and modern.
I wish we had more time in Paris and at Hotel De Empereur.
Next time!!
